item.description:
Herb is going to be throwing a potluck party that is fun and also explores chemistry and attraction! Here is a description of the event from Herb:

“Let’s explore chemistry and attraction. People are uniquely turned on – for some people it’s mostly physical and for many it’s emotional, aesthetic, about financial stability or shared interests. Let’s look at what turns you on or off – mannerisms, voice, history, sparkle in the eye, ability to help someone. This will be a thorough exploration of your personal chemical chart and what does it for you in its healthy or unhealthy implications. Optional vegetarian potluck at 6:30, stay after workshop to socialize.”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the party is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The $15.00 includes a party space, dinner type refreshments and Herb’s expertise. We are also encouraged to bring or share our own food as long as there is not any meat in it. Great food, company and meaning - an awesome way to spend a Friday night!
item.name: Chemistry and Attraction Potluck Party
